meta_title: SWMS Requirements NSW: The 2026 Compliance & Digital Guide
meta_description: Master SWMS requirements in NSW under WHS Regulation 2017. Discover the High Risk Construction Work list, digital compliance with Factory AI, and audit-proof
title: SWMS Requirements NSW: The Definitive Guide to Compliance, HRCW, and Digital Safety Workflows

hero_image.alt: Hero image for SWMS Requirements NSW: The Definitive Guide to Compliance, HRCW, and Digital Safety Workflows

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution image inside a modern manufacturing facility in New South Wales. The scene focuses on a diverse group of maintenance technicians and a safety officer conducting a toolbox talk near a large industrial conveyor belt system. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility vests, and safety glasses. One technician is holding a ruggedized tablet (showing only the back of the device) while gesturing toward the machinery, implying a digital workflow discussion. The lighting is bright and industrial, highlighting the clean, organized nature of the facility. No text or overlays in the image. The atmosphere is professional, safety-conscious, and collaborative.
